metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35472 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LemonLDAP::NG before 2.0.12. Session cache corruption can lead to authorization bypass or spoofing. By running a loop that makes many authentication attempts, an attacker might alternately be authenticated as one of two different users.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
